name: IsometricFighter
goals: Player moves with WASD, jumps (Space), punches (V)
Player has health, can take damage from enemies
One dummy enemy: no movement, takes damage, dies and respawns after 10 seconds
One enemy player: moves by itself and attacks the player with low damage, dies and respawns after 10 seconds
constraints: Split logic into separate scripts per behavior
Use public inspector variables for values
Scripts should be commented and beginner-friendly
